I like joining up people and systems, and think technology has a huge role to play in getting people sharing and collaborating.

I'm also interested in the potential of open source, open data and open standards to transform public services. I have a particular fondness for replacing people's fax machines and Access databases.

Outside of work I dabble in Ruby, web design and photography. I am still trying to work out how you relax when computers are your hobby as well as your job.

Powered by Github Pages. Views expressed in these pages were probably my own at the time of writing, and do not represent the views of any of my employers past, present or future. Site code at Github, feel free to fork.
